TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Rectangle extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Struct defining a rectangle, using doubles.

remarks.para: Application developers should be aware of the limits of floating-point representations, specifically the possibility of incorrect comparisons and equality checks for values with small differences. David Goldberg's paper What Every Computer Scientist Should Know About Floating-Point Arithmetic describes the issues excellently.
remarks.block: Where Xamarin.Forms supports XAML for structures, app devs can represent the rectangle as a comma-separated list of the X-coordinate, Y-Coordinate, Width, and Height.
